category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED Drivers
name: mikroe.click.leddriver18
short_description: LED Driver 18 Click is a compact add-on board that simplifies the control of multiple LEDs. This board features the TLC5947, a 24-channel LED driver from Texas Instruments. Each channel is individually adjustable with 4096 pulse-width modulated (PWM) steps and has a programmable current value of all channels with a maximum of 30mA of LED current per channel.
